xs.name: Extra Small
xs.description: Used for extra small devices such as mobile phones in portrait mode.

sm.name: Small
sm.description: Used for small devices like tablets in portrait mode or large smartphones.

md.name: Medium
md.description: Used for medium devices like tablets in landscape mode or small desktop screens.

lg.name: Large
lg.description: Used for large devices like laptops or medium-sized desktops.

xl.name: Extra Large
xl.description: Used for extra large devices such as high-resolution desktops or large laptops.

xxl.name: Extra Extra Large
xxl.description: Used for very large screens, typically large desktop monitors or TV displays.
